metadata.title: CVE-2019-11025 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In clearFilter() in utilities.php in Cacti before 1.2.3, no escaping occursbefore printing out the value of the SNMP community string (SNMP Options)in the View poller cache, leading to XSS.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
